list.text: A new API was added with Lollipop that helps extract prominent colors from a Bitmap. See my answer below for details. Since the Palette class mentioned is in the support7 library, it should work in older versions of Android as well. A new API was added with Lollipop that helps extract prominent colors from a Bitmap.
